item.title: FT Most Read: Monday, May 5, 2025 at 12:35 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Trump says he does not know if he needs to uphold the US constitution
2. Private equity’s best days are over, says Egyptian billionaire Sawiris
3. Chinese exporters ‘wash’ products in third countries to avoid Trump tariffs
4. Trump says he will impose 100% tariff on movies made abroad
5. Trump’s ‘Marie Antoinette moment’: call for national sacrifice falls flat
item.guid: FT Most Read: Monday, May 5, 2025 at 12:35 PM UTC
